objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='diagonalSplit' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#8A2BE2'/><stop offset='49%' stop-color='#8A2BE2'/><stop offset='51%' stop-color='#32CD32'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#32CD32'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#diagonalSplit)'/><g fill='#8A2BE2' opacity='.2'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='30'/><circle cx='180' cy='160' r='25'/><circle cx='260' cy='80' r='20'/><circle cx='100' cy='230' r='15'/><circle cx='180' cy='210' r='35'/></g><g fill='#32CD32' opacity='.2'><circle cx='820' cy='820' r='30'/><circle cx='900' cy='760' r='25'/><circle cx='980' cy='840' r='20'/><circle cx='820' cy='700' r='15'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='35'/></g><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='60' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='.2'/><circle cx='930' cy='930' r='80' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='.2'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='100' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='.1'/><g fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='.3'><path d='M200 200 L210 230 L240 240 L210 250 L200 280 L190 250 L160 240 L190 230 Z'/><path d='M880 160 L890 190 L920 200 L890 210 L880 240 L870 210 L840 200 L870 190 Z'/><path d='M160 880 L170 910 L200 920 L170 930 L160 960 L150 930 L120 920 L150 910 Z'/><path d='M900 850 L910 880 L940 890 L910 900 L900 930 L890 900 L860 890 L890 880 Z'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
✓ Non-Toxic & Safe
✓ Long-Lasting Fun
✓ Eco-Friendly Formula
✓ Stain-Free Guarantee

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This vibrant, playful banner features a split diagonal background with bright purple occupying the top-left half and vivid green in the bottom-right. The center prominently features a large image of a bubble solution container rising from the green portion, adding a whimsical product focus. The title text (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) features bold white and yellow fonts for strong contrast and attention. A subheading (`subheading`) beneath it emphasizes quality, while a bullet list (`description`) highlights key benefits. A pricing callout (`price_label` and `price`) with contrasting yellow and white text draws value attention. A yellow call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) completes the promotional message.

**Color Palette:**
- Bright Purple: #8A2BE2
- Lime Green: #32CD32
- White: #FFFFFF
- Yellow: #FFFF00
- Bold Violet (for CTA text): #8A2BE2
product_color: The product image features a bright and playful color palette that emphasizes fun and energy, ideal for a children's product like bubbles. The dominant lime green (#7CF15C) of the liquid creates a vibrant base, while a rich purple (#8336A3) on the cap and label introduces contrast and visual appeal. The word "Gazillion" is outlined in yellow (#FFD900) and purple, with a gradient of lime green to neon green (#A8E129–#6BD111), making it pop. "BUBBLES" is in bold orange-yellow (#FFB800), attracting attention. Pastel bubbles in soft lavenders and light blues (#C9D8F0) add a whimsical touch. Together, these colors are blended vividly for dynamic, eye-catching banners.
